text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @PressSec Nancy Pelosi and the rest of her fellow Dumos should have their TAXPAYER PAID salaries withheld since this whole Covid19 started. They withheld votes at the beginning & tried to include their pet projects, forgetting the American people who are suffering & who pay THEIR salaries
